character.name: Walter White
character.role: High school chemestry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer

character.name: Jessie Pinkman
character.role: Former student of Walter White and methamphetamine manufacturer

character.name: Mike Ehrmantraut
character.role: Former police officer turned fixer and enforcer for Gus Fring and Saul Goodman
character.quote: Just because you shot Jesse James...don't make you Jesse James!

character.name: Lydia Rodarte-Quayle
character.role: Executive at Madrigal Electromotive and key player in the methamphetamine operation
character.quote: I'm not a criminal, I just work for one!

character.name: Hector Salamanca
character.role: Former enforcer for the Mexican drug cartel
character.quote: He really did a number on you.
